name: Last mage
description:
The final plan for this game is to have a mage ascend from a mountain, to inside a castle, to outside the castle, to the top in order to save the princess from the dragon. We do plan on completing this game, so if you wish to follow the progress, that would be greatly appreciated :D

CONTROLS:

A         -  Left

D         -  Right

LMB  -  Grapple

RMB  -  Spell Jump
